column2: "Kohri... Is it really safe here? We don't know if that monster could appear anywhere."
"Hitsugi, you can't hear it, can you..."
"\"Mother\" just told me everything! Why can't you hear her, Hitsugi?!"
"Like I said. That child's a traitor. \"Mother\" has forsaken and disowned her."
"You're!-"
"I shall introduce myself again, miss. I'm Hagith. Hagith Anie."
"Mother Cluster, Apostle of Gold. You could say that I'm Mother Cluster's Executive."
"Executive? Apostle of Gold? Wait!- The people chosen by \"Mother\" to manage ESC-A under Mother Cluster!"
"Manage ESC-A, you say? Of course, there's more to it than that, right?"
"Right now, all global communications are based on Ether."
"Utilizing Ether has allowed Mother Cluster to spread around the world. Mother Cluster is deeply tied into the world."
"What made my company successful... Of course, it was down to my talent as a developer, but... Well, you've seen the advantages."
"Celebrities, large corporations, even governments themselves, all infiltrated by Mother Cluster. Do you understand what I'm saying?"
"With the power of Mother Cluster, you can do anything. Taking over a school is a piece of cake. Even the world, if we wanted."
"What's up with that..! In other words, Mother Cluster already dominates the world!"
"...You're wrong, Hitsugi. It's not like that."
"Mother Cluster isn't dominating, it's supporting the world from behind the scenes."
"That's what \"Mother\" said. That's what \"Mother\" taught us."
"Kohri..."
"You're the one manipulating those monsters... even Kohri..!"
"Woah, don't get the wrong idea. I'm not manipulating Kohri at all."
"She's acting on her own. In response to her contact with \"Mother\", she's trying to save you herself. Isn't that right?"
"...Hitsugi. Please, hand over Aru without asking anything."
"If you do that, \"Mother\" said she'll forgive you, Hitsugi... \"Mother\" always keep her promises."
"\"Mother\" is asking for Aru..? Why!?"
"That... that doesn't matter!!"
"Hitsugi, I beg you! Hand over Aru, and let's go back to the way things used to be!"
"...Big sis... I'm scared."
"What \"Mother\" said..."
"What I've seen..."
"What I should believe..."
"Hitsugi... Why..."
"Honestly? I don't know why. I was planning to be pragmatic, but..."
"...But Aru protected me, even when I was totally clueless. I can't just abandon him like that!"
"Time to back down, Kohri. Your role is done here, leave the rest to me."
"Wait! Hitsugi's still being deceived by them! If we talk to her, she'll definitely understand!"
"Kohri!"
"That's enough of your student chit-chat. We're talking business now, young lady. Business about my contact with \"Mother\"."
"My job is to take that child, Aru, back with me to \"Mother\"."
"I'm the \"smooth-working\" type of person. Without having anything bothersome in my way, easy as fiddling with an app."
"A glowing... Tablet?"
"Heh, you can see it too. It's something that you can only see if \"Mother\" gave you Ether Aptitude."
"This is my Emerald Tablet. It gives me the ability to remodel, shape and control Phantoms under my command. My mass-produced army."
"It created all those monsters!?"
"Oh come on, did you think that \"Ether\" could only only be used for communication?"
"Ether can be used to embody your desires. When you control the power of Ether, creating an army like this is nothing."
"...Now, my army! As my arms and legs, complete your work quickly and efficiently."
"Is this... the end? Does my story end here?"
"Without knowing or understanding anything... I'm going to end up losing?"
"Big sis!"
"No. I'm not giving up. This time..."
"I'll protect you!"
"That weapon... an embodied weapon!? You manifested it at the last second?"
"Haaa... haaah..!"
"I see my workload is building up."
"However, we've already predicted this level of irregular activity. My job covers crushing \"bugs\" like you."
"...What's this reading? From... above?"
"Wha-!"
